name: Laws of Karma — #11 Law of Patience and Reward
description:
Life taught us that reward always come for those who work hard and persistent. But the big question is, "wen?"

"When will the reward come?"
"I've been struggling this whole time, when will I get a better result?"
"Wen lambo?"

When it feels like a never ending waiting game, all you need to do is keep doing the best of you, stay hopeful, and be patient. Your patience will attract happiness, it brings near that which is far.
